programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Sofijas un Klaiva attiecības ir plaši pazīstamas, taču atklājums draud sagraut visu šovu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Alekss nejauši atklāj noslēpumu par Heiliju viņu tētim. Kamerons vilto muguras traumu, lai pieķertu Klēru melos. Mičels atzīstas noslēpumā par vienu no Džeja lepnākajiem mirkļiem. Lūks palīdz Menijam mēģināt atstāt iespaidu uz meiteni.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klēras, Heilijas un Aleksas cikli sagrauj Fila lielos plānus. Mičels mēģina sarīkot smalku ballīti Kamerona "desmitajā" dzimšanas dienā. Glorija vēlas, lai Džejs iesaistās cīņā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Alam jādodas uz attālu apakšveļas veikalu, lai iegādātos Pegijai no ražošanas izņemtu krūšturi.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Izmisušie Als un Stīvs liek kopā galvas, meklējot risinājumus gaidāmajai plikpaurībai. Stīvs sāk pamanīt savu matu līniju atkāpšanos, savukārt Alam tas ir pilnīgi vienalga. Neveiksmīgi izmēģinājis matu toniku, Stīvs mēģina pievienoties plikpaurīgo vīriešu klubam Bald American Dudes (B.A.D.) un atved sev līdzi Alu, kurš rīko tikšanos apavu veikalā.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Sofijas un Klaiva attiecības ir plaši pazīstamas, taču atklājums draud sagraut visu šovu.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Dalgliešs dodas uz reliģisku skolu Rietumsaseksā, lai izmeklētu garīdznieka nāvi. Viņš atklāj, ka gandrīz neviens viņu necieta un ka vairāki liecinieki melo.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka kāda vīra nāve ir saistīta ar līdzekļu izšķērdēšanu hidroelektrostacijas projektā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks zina, ka Takera slepkavību organizēja Tonijs Petruči, tomēr situāciju saasina gangstera bēgšana.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens rakstnieks nonāk Elīzas izmeklēšanas centrā, kad atbilstoši viņa grāmatu saturam tiek veiktas vairākas slepkavības. Djūks sadarbojas ar jauno superintendantu un problemātisku jaunu detektīvu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam beidzot veicas ar Zemkopības ministrijas TB testēšanas shēmu, un Tristans dodas uz randiņu ar Sigfrīda ienaidnieka meitu Florenci Pandi.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna uzņemas vairāk, nekā spēj paveikt, izmeklējot slepkavību starptautiskā kulinārijas skolā, atklājot korupcijas labirintu, kas ved atpakaļ uz Melburnas policiju.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Greiema Kinga sieva Šērlija tiek noslepkavota sprādzienā, kas gandrīz prasa arī Peregrīnas dzīvību, izmeklēšana uzkarst un atklāj krāpniecisku darbību labirintu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Zigfrīds un Tristans kļūst par atbildīgajiem, kad Holas kundze dodas projām, lai tiktos ar kādu svarīgu personu no pagātnes. Dženija atklāj Helēnai, ka viņa pieņēmusi nozīmīgu lēmumu par nākotni.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka kāda vīra nāve ir saistīta ar līdzekļu izšķērdēšanu hidroelektrostacijas projektā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad bagāts baronets viens pats nomirst savā istabā dienu pirms kāzām, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija jau atkal nonāk aizraujoša noslēpuma epicentrā.

programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons un Soames Forsaiti cīnās par ģimenes firmas mantošanas tiesībām. Notikumu ķēde apdraud viņu dzīves stabilitāti, un viņiem nākas izvēlēties starp pienākumu un sirdi.

programme.title: Asinis Vīnē
programme.desc: Zigmunda Freida audzēknis Makss Lībermans palīdz Oskaram Reinhārtam izmeklēt šausminošu slepkavību sēriju 1990-to gadu Vīnes operas namos un lielākajās kafejnīcās.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons un Soames Forsaiti cīnās par ģimenes firmas mantošanas tiesībām. Notikumu ķēde apdraud viņu dzīves stabilitāti, un viņiem nākas izvēlēties starp pienākumu un sirdi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam beidzot veicas ar Zemkopības ministrijas TB testēšanas shēmu, un Tristans dodas uz randiņu ar Sigfrīda ienaidnieka meitu Florenci Pandi.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Zigfrīds un Tristans kļūst par atbildīgajiem, kad Holas kundze dodas projām, lai tiktos ar kādu svarīgu personu no pagātnes. Dženija atklāj Helēnai, ka viņa pieņēmusi nozīmīgu lēmumu par nākotni.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad slavenais Peregrīnas ēkas arhitekts tiek atrasts miris saunā kopā ar cita vīrieša sievu, Peregrīna un Džeims uzskata, ka greizsirdīgais vīrs varētu būt vainojams slepkavībā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad radio tiek ziņots, ka Lielbritānija drīz iesaistīsies karā, Džeimss atklāj tuberkulozes gadījumu Hestongreindžā, bet Ričards lūdz par to neziņot ministrijai.

programme.desc: Nācijas mīļākais TV pāris Sandra Dāre un Stjuarts Hovards ir ieradušies Erceņģeļa ielā, lai filmētu savu pēdējo filmu, bet statisti nomirst pēc trupai paredzētas saindētas šokolādes apēšanas.

programme.desc: Mis Mārpla izmeklē jauna optimistiska pāra sabrukumu, kuri ignorēja brīdinājumus par čigānu un uzbūvēja sapņu māju uz iespējami nolādētas zemes.

programme.title: "Giro di Lombardia"
programme.desc: The Giro di Lombardia, officially Il Lombardia, is a cycling race in Lombardy, Italy. It is traditionally the last of the five Monuments of the season, considered to be one of the most prestigious one-day events in cycling, and one of the last events on the UCI World Tour calendar.

Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: From the Shadows
programme.desc: Terri has a great life, a great boyfriend and she just won the lottery! Then she awakens to find herself in a dungeon being tortured by an insane doctor obsessed with his new date rape drug, in search of her winning lottery ticket. The horror she encounters is not only in front of her, but in the darkest recesses of her mind.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: Guči nams
programme.desc: Patrīzija Reggiani - ārzemniece no pazemīgiem sociālajiem slāņiem - ieprecas Gucci ģimenē. Viņas nevaldāmās ambīcijas sāk izjaukt mantojumu un iedarbina neapdomīgu nodevības, dekadences, atriebības un galu galā slepkavības spirāli.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: Lielās cerības
programme.desc: 19. gadsimta sākuma Londona. Ar noslēpumaina labdara palīdzību nabadzīgais jauneklis Pips, kas uzaudzis bez vecākiem, negaidīti iekļūst Londonas smalkajās aprindās. Jaunajā džentlmeņa statusā viņš uzmeklē Estellu - daiļo bagātas ģimenes atvasi, ko iemīlējis vēl būdams mazs puika. Taču, ja kāds atklātu viņa patieso pagātni, sagrautu jauno cilvēku un visu, kas viņam dārgs...

programme.title: Gūsteknes
programme.desc: Kelers Dovers pārdzīvo jebkuru vecāku ļaunāko murgu - nolaupīta viņa 6 gadus vecā meitiņa un viņas draudzene. Laiks skrien, taču detektīvs Lokijs, kurš vada izmeklēšanu, nonāk strupceļā. Vienīgais pavediens - netālu no nozieguma vietas noparkotais autofurgons. Taču tā šoferis, kaut sākumā arestēts, vēlāk atbrīvots pierādījumu trūkuma dēļ. Izmisuma dzīts, tēvs nolemj taisnību meklēt pats.

programme.title: Natatorija
programme.desc: Ciemojoties pie atsvešinātajiem vecvecākiem, astoņpadsmitgadīgā Liljas pilsētā piedalās atlasē. Viņu savrupmājā jūtoties kā mājās, viņa tiek ierauta ģimenes tumšajā pagātnē un uzzina dzīvībai bīstamus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Bellas salas maģija
programme.desc: Vesternu romānu autors, alkoholiķis Montijs Vildhorns ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa brāļadēls mudina viņu uz vasaru doties uz kluso Bellas salu. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar vientuļo mammu un viņas 3 meitenēm, kas palīdz viņam rast iedvesmu atsākt rakstīt.

programme.title: Kā debesīs
programme.desc: Kādā fermā 19. gadsimta beigās aizsākas intensīva gaidīšana - mātei sākas sarežģītas dzemdības, un 14 gadus vecajai Līzei ir jāsagatavojas naktij, kas varētu mainīt viņas dzīvi uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Čārlija Banksa izglītība
programme.desc: Koledžas students Čārlijs Banks spiests saskarties ar senām problēmām - pāridarītājs, ar ko viņam reiz nācies piedzīvot nepatīkamus brīžus, ieradies viņa skolas pilsētiņā.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Chauhan V. Lofaso
programme.desc: The captains lead the way as the teams must work together in a build-a-better-burger relay race to win a time advantage for a competitive BBQ auction.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: After more than 20 nonstop hours, the final chefs must create an elevated lunch and dinner to win $75,000 and the winning title!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Brittanny Anderson takes on the Titans. Things get spicy before history is made when judge Michael Psilakis awards the first-ever perfect score.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon is ready to relax outdoors in style as he prepares a classic trout dish, smoky potatoes, a flavourful salad and a bubbly cocktail.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Chauhan V. Lofaso
programme.desc: The captains lead the way as the teams must work together in a build-a-better-burger relay race to win a time advantage for a competitive BBQ auction.

programme.title: Halloween Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 2. Show.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Bobby Flay hosts a tough cooking competition as one competing chef faces off against Bobbys three culinary Titans for a chance to win $25,000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri eats his way through out-of-bounds risotto in Atlanta, real deal relleno in Anthem, AZ, and succulent snapper in Arlington, TX.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri checks in with some of his favourite global flavours, including ramen in Atlanta, tamales in Indianapolis and marinara in St. Louis.

programme.title: Halloween Cake-Off
programme.desc: Hosted by Duff Goldman, Halloween Cake-Off invites some of Americas most talented bakers to compete in spooky challenges, where they are judged on their frighteningly brilliant creations. With $10,000 up for grabs, the bakers will need to showcase not only their baking abilities, but also their artistry. These edible masterpieces are meticulously designed and intricately decorated, forming a creation that looks as good as it tastes.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff
programme.desc: Two of Americas most prominent baking connoisseurs whisk, beat and whip against each other to become the champion of cake. Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Stabilizators
programme.desc: Izbijušais ASV specvienības kareivis Makkals ir inscenējis savu nāvi, lai dzīves atlikušo daļu pavadītu mierā, dzīvojot klusu dzīvi Bostonā. Tomēr no šī plāna nākas atteikties, kad viņš satiek jaunu meiteni Teriju, kura nonākusi nežēlīgas un vardarbīgas krievu mafijas rokās - tādā situācijā Makkals nespēj vienkārši noskatīties. Skaidrs, ka viņam meitene jāglābj, un nākas atkal ķerties pie ieročiem un darīt to, ko viņš prot vislabāk.

programme.title: Nāve bērēs
programme.desc: Kad kuplas britu ģimenes tēvs mirst, tiek sarīkotas grandiozas bēres. Tomēr tajās haosu izraisa kāds vīrs, kam esot zināmi tumši noslēpumi par aizgājēju. Šantāžists ir gatavs saglabāt ģimenes reputāciju, viņa vārdiem sakot, par mazu summu, bet ar daudzām nullēm.

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Gaismas impērija
programme.desc: Iespaidīgs un aizkustinošs stāsts par cilvēciskajām attiecībām, kino burvību, izcilu angļu dzeju un 80. gadu populāro mūziku. Ar šizofrēniju sirgstošā Hilarija (Olīvija Kolmana) strādā pilsētiņas kinoteātrī un ir spiesta samierināties ar sava priekšnieka Elisa kunga (Kolina Fērta) aizskarošo uzvedību. Visi par to zina, taču neviens neiejaucas. Tomēr viss mainās, kad darbā tiek pieņemts jaunais Stīvens. Neskatoties uz vecuma starpību, abi iemīlas.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Vīri melnā: Globālie draudi
programme.desc: Vīri melnā ir slepena organizācija, kas sargā Zemes mieru un drošību. Tā ne reizi vien ir aizstāvējusi cilvēci no Visuma neģēļiem. Bet šoreiz viņiem būs jātiek galā ar lielākajiem līdz šim pieredzētajiem globālajiem draudiem – spiegu viņu pašu rindās.

programme.title: Karalis Artūrs
programme.desc: Artūrs nevēlas kļūt par vadoni. Viņa vienīgā vēlme ir atstāt Lielbritāniju un atgriezties Romas mierīgajā un līdzsvarotajā dzīvē. Taču pirms tam viņam kopā ar Apaļā galda bruņiniekiem jādodas pēdējā uzdevumā. Top skaidrs, ka pēc Romas sairšanas Lielbritānijai vajadzēs karali, kas ne tikai aizsargās valsti pret nemitīgajiem sakšu iebrukumiem, bet arī iedibinās uz salas jaunu kārtību. Ar Merlina un daiļās, drosmīgās Ginevras atbalstu Artūram būs sevī jārod spēks, lai mainītu vēstures gaitu.

programme.title: Slepenā mītne
programme.desc: Raiens Reinoldss tēlo jaunu CIP aģentu Metu Vestonu, kurš strādā slepenā mītnē Keiptaunā, Dienvidāfrikā, kad tiek notverts vismeklētākais bijušais CIP aģents Tobins Frosts (Denzels Vašingtons) un nogādāts šajā mītnē. Frosta nopratināšanas laikā mītnē iebrūk algotņi, kuri vēlas notvert Frostu. Vestons un Frosts izglābjas, taču viņi būs drošībā tikai tad, kad atradīs citu drošu mītni.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Atgriešanās mājās
programme.desc: Sajūsmināts par pavadīto laiku kopā ar Atriebējiem, Pīters Pārkers ir atgriezies mājās, kur dzīvo kopā ar tanti Meju sava jaunā mentora Tonija Stārka uzraudzībā. Viņš cenšas dzīvot vienkāršu pusaudža dzīvi, tomēr nespēj nedomāt par to, ka varētu būt sabiedrībai noderīgs ar savām supervaroņa spējām. Kad pie apvāršņa parādās ļaundaris, viņam būs iespēja tās likt lietā!

programme.title: Randiņfilma
programme.desc: Atrast savu īsto mūža mīlestību nav nemaz tik viegli. Bet, kad tas notiek, sākas ļoti gara pārpratumu virkne, jo iemīļotais taču vēl ir jāiepazīstina ar saviem draugiem. Arī tas būtu nieks. Viņš ir jāiepazīstina ar saviem vecākiem! Kuri noteikti nav parasti un normāli vecāki, bet gan vecāki ar neiedomājami daudz dīvainībām, no kurām lielāko daļu tu nebiji līdz šim pamanījusi. Un vēl tā seksīgā kāzu plānotāja! Beigās izrādās, ka palikt kopā ar savu iemīļoto līdz kāzām ir patiešām grūts pārbaudījums.

programme.title: Likteņa ironija
programme.desc: Nekustamo īpašumu aģente Margo un advokāts Grifins varētu būt ideāls pāris, diemžēl abi viens par otra eksistenci pat nenojauš. Turklāt dienu pirms Vecgada vakara Margo un Grifins iesāk ar lielām cerībām – viņiem ir īpaši plāni vakaram ar savām otrajām pusītēm. Taču liktenis visu saliks savās vietās: pēc jautras ballītes ar draugiem taksists Grifinu aizvedīs uz norādīto adresi, tikai... nepareizajā pilsētā! To, ka iekļuvis neīstajā namā, viņš sapratīs vien tad, kad mājās pārnāks Margo.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets
programme.desc: Dienā, kad zobenzobu vāveri vajā neveiksmes un viņa gandrīz pazaudē savu lielāko dārgumu ozolzīli, visi dzīvnieki dodas ceļā uz dienvidiem, meklējot glābiņu no aukstuma, kas piemeklējis zemi. Sliņķis Sids un mamuts Manfreds par ceļabiedriem kļūst nejauši. Pēc zobenzobu tīģeru uzbrukuma cilvēku apmetnei viņi izglābj mazuli. Par to rūpes uzņemas citkārt slinkais Sids un, kaut gan diezgan negribīgi, arī Manfreds. Nospriežot, ka bērna tētis ir dzīvs, viņi dodas to meklēt. Drīz ceļiniekiem pievienojas arī zobenzobu tīģeris Djego, kura uzdevums ir mazuli nolaupīt. Tā sākas draugu aizraujošais ceļojums, kura laikā visnepiemērotākajos brīžos pie apvāršņa parādās zobenzobu vāvere Skrets, izmisīgi cenzdamies glābt savu ozolzīli.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 2: atkusnis
programme.desc: Laika ziņas: Tuvākās piecas dienas ir gaidāmi lieli plūdi, kam sekos pasaules gals. Iespējams, nedēļas beigās varētu izlauzties kāds saules stariņš… Mamutam Manijam, sliņķim Sidam, zobenzobu tīģerim Djego, zobenzobu vāverei Skratam un pārējiem Ledus laikmeta iemītniekiem ir sajūta, ka viņu kūstošā pasaule sāk palikt pārāk slapja un ledus kalns, kas apdraud ieleju, tūlīt lūzīs. Taču tā nav vienīgā problēma – Manijs vairs nevēlas būt viens pats, taču ir pamatotas aizdomas, ka viņš ir pēdējais mamuts. Atkal ir jādodas ceļā, kur tiek satikta valdzinoša mamutiene (iespējams, pēdējā visā pasaulē) Elija, kuru pavada uzņēmīgs oposumu pārītis Krešs un Edijs.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 3: Dinozauru ēra
programme.desc: Kas var būt lieliskāks par vismīļāko aizvēsturisko draugu atgriešanos? Šoreiz Manijs ar biedriem atklāj zudušu pasauli, kurā mājo zvērīgi dinozauri. To vidū ir arī īdzīgs tiranozaurs, kam kārtojami īpaši rēķini ar sliņķi Sidu. Arī smieklīgā vāverēna dzīvē pienācis pārmaiņu laiks - viņš sastop neatvairāmi daiļu vāveru jaunkundzi, bet nekad jau nevar tā īsti zināt, vai dāma alkst nolaupīt viņa sirdi vai kvēli dievināto zīli.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Vilka sauciens
programme.desc: Franču zemūdene ir briesmās.

programme.title: Līdz uzvaras vārtiem
programme.desc: Bez darba palikušais un alkoholu mīlošais futbola treneris Tomass Rongens dodas uz ASV Samoa, lai vadītu turienes komandu un palīdzētu tai sagatavoties Pasaules čempionāta atlases sacensībām. Galvenā problēma valsts komandas pastāvēšanās vēsturē - tā vēl nav ne reizi iesitusi nevienus vārtus saviem pretiniekiem un spēles laikā ir uzstādījusi antirekordu futbola vēsturē - ielaisti 31 vārti. Tomasu sagaida grūts darbs ne tikai ar komandu, bet arī pašam ar sevi.

programme.title: Cīņas klubs
programme.desc: "Cīņas kluba" galvenais varonis ir vārdā nenosaukts automašīnu firmas darbinieks, kurš cieš no bezmiega un kopumā ir dziļi neapmierināts ar savu karjeras izvēli. Kopā ar ziepju vārītāju Taileru Dērdenu viņš izveido cīņas klubu un tiek ierauts Tailera un kādas izklaidīgas sievietes, Marlas Singeres, attiecību krustugunīs. Režisors Finčers bija iecerējis, ka "Cīņas kluba" vardarbība ir kā metafora konfliktam starp jauno paaudzi un reklāmas industrijas vērtību sistēmu. Kino kritiķi filmu vērtējuši ļoti dažādi. Tā tiek dēvēta par vienu no pretrunīgākajām un aprunātākajām 1999. gada filmām. Savukārt filmas DVD versija bija komerciāli veiksmīga un padarīja "Cīņas klubu" par kulta filmu.

programme.title: Atzīstiet manu vainu
programme.desc: Kad policijai beidzot izdodas arestēt divdesmit Lukēzi mafijas klana locekļus, Džekijs Dinoršio, ar iesauku Resnais, kurš jau izcieš 30 gadu cietumsodu, saņem vilinošu piedāvājumu – Džekiju atbrīvos priekšlaicīgi, ja viņš liecinās pret saviem draugiem. Bet Resnais Di nav nodevējs! Tiesas procesā, kas izrādīsies garākais un skandalozākais ASV tiesu praksē, Džekijs sevi aizstāvēs pats.

programme.title: Ar ieročiem rokās
programme.desc: Mailzs, pieaudzis vīrietis, kura bērnības sapņi neīstenojās, vada savas dienas, izniekojot laiku pie datora un kaitinot tīmekļa troļļus ar dzēlīgiem komentāriem. Kādu dienu viņš uzzina par tīmekļa sensāciju "Skizm", kas iesaista cilvēkus spēlē uz dzīvību un nāvi. Mailzs sāk kaitināt spēles skatītājus un piesaista vietnes administratoru uzmanību. Viņi ielaužas Mailza mājā, nolaupa vīrieti un piespiež iesaistīties iznīcinošajā spēlē. Mailzam ir uzdevums – nogalināt Niksu, vienu no nežēlīgākajām "Skizm" spēlētājām. Sākas postoša, spraiga un stilīga spēle – kurš izdzīvos?

programme.title: Iebrukums
programme.desc: Kad kaimiņvalsts Veragva negaidot uzbrūk Kirasao un Arubai, tas pārsteidz Dānijas valdību nesagatavotu. Konflikts strauji attīstās, un trim dāņu komandas biedriem jāsaprot, kā rīkoties pareizi.

programme.title: Basketbols: ACB league. Joventut - Zaragoza
programme.desc: Tune in and follow all the matches from the ACB League, also known as the Endesa League for sponsorship reasons, the top-tier mens basketball league in Spain.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Izslēgšanas spēles. Fināls. 4. spēle. Las Vegas - Phoenix
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Izslēgšanas spēles. Fināls. 5. spēle. Phoenix - Las Vegas
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: MOTO GP. Indonēzija. Sacīkstes
programme.desc: Coverage of the Indonesian motorcycle Grand Prix, an important motorcycling event which forms part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing World Championship. The MotoGP race features some of the most successful motorcycle riders.

programme.title: Basketbols: ACB league. Bilbao Basket - Burgos
programme.desc: Tune in and follow all the matches from the ACB League, also known as the Endesa League for sponsorship reasons, the top-tier mens basketball league in Spain.

programme.title: Basketbols: ACB league. Baskonia - Real Madrid
programme.desc: Tune in and follow all the matches from the ACB League, also known as the Endesa League for sponsorship reasons, the top-tier mens basketball league in Spain.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Fenerbahce - Crvena Zvezda
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Crvena Zvezda Meridianbet Belgrade - Zalgiris Kaunas
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: BCL. Hapoel Holon - Joventut
programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: UFC. Charles Oliveira-Mateusz Gamrot
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. ZSC Lions - Ambri/Piotta
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: Basketbols: BCL. Hapoel Holon - Joventut
programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Olympiacos - Anadolu Efes
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. FC Bayern - Olimpia Milano
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. programme.title: NHL. Los Angeles Kings - Winnipeg Jets
Basketbols: ACB league. Girona - UCAM Murcia
My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire guests, Joanna transforms the Seed and Supply building at the Silos into a flower art workshop and crafting space.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna updates an entry foyer and dining room with an elegant take on the homeowners Southwestern style, using earthy colours and refined details.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A retired couple is leaving Atlanta for St. Simons Island. With many children and grandchildren, they want a large property where they can host family.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple is moving from Nebraska to the beaches of St. Simons Island, Georgia. He grew up on the island and is ready to come home.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn buy an off-market property in one of the oldest and most desirable neighbourhoods in Honolulu. Can they make it high-end on a budget?

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Things get off to a rocky start as Kamohai and Tristyn attempt their priciest flip to date. They need to add some serious square footage appeal.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Bargain Block

With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A couple combs the hills of central Vermont for a unique cabin to raise their son in. Theyre looking for a home with rustic charm and a spacious kitchen.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A family of four search for their dream cabin in Americas Dairyland. They want a log home with lake access in the quaint town of Mauston, WI.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. programme.title: Cheap Old Houses

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: One of the most famous explorers in the world, Percy Fawcett, becomes obsessed with a lost city deep in the Amazon jungle, a place he names the City of Z. What happened to Percy Fawcett… and where is the Lost City of Z?

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: One of the most famous explorers in the world, Percy Fawcett, becomes obsessed with a lost city deep in the Amazon jungle, a place he names the City of Z. What happened to Percy Fawcett… and where is the Lost City of Z?

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island

They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar follows the exploits of treasure hunters Hamilton White and his long-time friend, Carl Cookson, as they search for the treasure hoard reputed to have belonged to the legendary Knights Templar. The mysterious Knights were the equivalent of todays special forces and were the most skilled fighters in the ranks of the Crusaders. However, up until the present day, no major item belonging to the Knights has ever been discovered. But Hamilton and Carl believe that they have now found a treasure trove that reveals who the Knights were, how they practised their beliefs, and why they were hunted, imprisoned and disbanded by Papal decree in 1307. programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.
